description: Creates a readiness check in an account. A readiness check monitors a resource set in your application, such as a set of Amazon Aurora instances, that Application Recovery Controller is auditing recovery readiness for. The audits run once every minute on every resource that's associated with a readiness check.

parameters.name: ReadinessCheckName
parameters.description: The name of the readiness check to create.

parameters.name: ResourceSetName
parameters.description: The name of the resource set to check.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: ReadinessCheckArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with a readiness check.

nested_items.name: ResourceSet
nested_items.description: Name of the resource set to be checked.
